mapper.sql: SELECT MNU_ID, MNU_NM, ATV_DESC, USER_ID, MNU_TYPE, LVL, URL FROM ${tableName}
mapper.select: /** ActiveHist.selectActiveHistFindByUserId */ SELECT HIS.MNU_ID, MN.MNU_NM, MN.MNU_TYPE, MN.LVL, MN.URL FROM ( SELECT MNU_ID FROM TB_FOR_ATV_HIST WHERE USER_ID=#{userId } AND IS_DEL='N' AND INSRT_DATE > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY MNU_ID ORDER BY INSRT_DATE DESC LIMIT 10 ) HIS LEFT JOIN TB_FOR_MNU MN ON HIS.MNU_ID=MN.MNU_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FOR_ATV_HIST ( USER_ID, MNU_ID, ATV_DESC, IS_DEL, INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId }, #{mnuId }, #{atvDesc }, 'N', #{userId }, now(), #{userId }, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FOR_ATV_HIST SET IS_DEL='Y', UPDT_ID=#{userId }, UPDT_DATE=now() WHERE USER_ID=#{userId } AND MNU_ID=#{mnuId }
